title: RMIT University Rumble

embed.description: What is Rumble? Rumble is a multi week tournament experience for players to compete, practise and grow together. - Show good sportsmanship. Tournament officials can boot you from an event if you can't play nicely with others. - Listen to the tournament officials. They have the final decision on tournament disputes.

body:
What is Rumble? 
Rumble is a multi week tournament experience for players to compete, practise and grow together.

- Show good sportsmanship. Tournament officials can boot you from an event if you can’t play nicely with others.
- Listen to the tournament officials. They have the final decision on tournament disputes.
- Please read the rules, they apply to everyone in this event.
- A tournament organiser may have club specific rules that adjust or add on to the base rule set. If any club specific rules differ from the base set the club specific rules take precedence.
- Players should only enter the University Rumble if they are prepared to meet the above expectations.

This event will only be available to 2017 RMIT Students and LOG members!

If you have any questions, feel free to contact our Facebook page!

https://www.facebook.com/RMITLoLClub/

Regards,
Bk
